about_the_game:
Traverse a cave, factory, and other strange places within Pitch Black. Meet many horrific, monstrous, or simply strange creatures, some of which may help you along the way. Discover odd puzzles and mysteries yet to be solved. Can you find a way out and maybe help some new friends along the way?

Story Introduction

In a large, dark, damp cave, a child plays with his own echo, previously playing with his friends left behind outside. But, without any light to guide him, he trips on a small rock and falls to his side into a deep, dark pit. If he could see below himself, he would have noticed rocks below that would surely impale him–but they don’t. Instead, it stops and he ends up in a room with jagged stone walls wreaking a metallic smell. After a moment he finds a nearby chamberstick, a matchbox, and two locked cells nearby… what must he do now?

Run from the watchful eye, stay clear of the crawling corpse, and keep a lookout for any other creature you may run into in the first area. There is certainly something wrong with this place, and you must be the one to figure it out…

content_descriptors.notes: Content is Rated for Mature-Teens (16+ or 13+ with Parental Supervision) by IronProject. Contains bloodshed, dismemberment, fantasy violence, and mild profanity.
